name: Boss Wars on the Edge of Space
name_original: Boss Wars on the Edge of Space
description:
Boss Wars on the edge of Space A 1-bit battle for the right to rule the universe.

Choose your side. Either vanquish evil from the known universe or destroy the forces of good. In Boss Wars on the edge of Space you can play as the hero or the boss...

Made for the Vimjam 2 Game Jam, September 2021.

All the music from this game is taken from my Sci-Fi Music Pack. Downloadable here. You can get access to all my music packs + all future releases by becoming a Patreon. 

Player Controls: WASD / UP ARROW / SPACEBAR
Boss Controls: MOUSE

Check out my YouTube Channel for devlogs on the making of all my games.
